verbose_text: In brains co-electroporated with shCHD5 and either hCHD3 or mCHD4, the number of neurons that reached the CP (XREF_FIG A, 6C, and 6D) and ectopic expression of the upper layer markers SATB2 and Cux1 (XREF_FIG A and 6B) were comparable to neurons electroporated with shCHD5 alone.
evidence: expression of the upper layer markers SATB2
